name: Bloggers are Journalists
body:
#### Bloggers are journalists.

We want to create an ondemand newspapers service that delivers blogger content to readers in printed format in a weekly periodical. The newpapers will be customized to the user and the users will be able to vote and rate the articles online to help guide the printing. This service will turn bloggers into journalists and help protect them under the law. The readers will not only get great readable collecter items, but also be supporting bloggers and protecting them from legal problems.

## Laws

Recently there was a law proposed by Villalba in Texas to define journalists writing for an magazine published at least once a week.

http://www.legis.state.tx.us/tlodocs/84R/billtext/pdf/HB02918I.pdf

> (B) a newspaper that is qualified under Section 2051.044, Government Code, to publish legal notices or is a free newspaper of general circulation and that is published at least once a week and available and of interest to the general public in connection with the dissemination of news or public affairs; or 
> (C) a magazine that appears at a regular interval, that contains stories, articles, and essays by various writers, and that is available and of interest to the general public in connection with the dissemination of news or public affairs

## Print on demand
There are a few services to print newspapers on demand.
* http://www.diginewspress.com/
* http://www.newspaper-service.ch/index.cfm

There is a service to print your own newspaper
* http://www.newspaperclub.com/

There are systems to automatically collect content and create fake online newspapers :
* http://paper.li/

There are services to read newspapers online :
* http://www.pressreader.com/
